mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.title,a.author, AsText(location) location, X(location) x,Y(location) y, SQRT(POW( ABS( X(location) - #{x}), 2) + POW( ABS(Y(location) - #{y}), 2 ))*#{times} distance, b.file_url videoUrl,c.file_url imageUrl,l.`name` areaName,l.id areaId from map_presentation a LEFT JOIN sys_file b on a.video_id=b.id LEFT JOIN sys_file c on a.image_id=c.id LEFT JOIN map_layer l on a.area_id=l.id where Intersects( location, GeomFromText(CONCAT('POLYGON((', (#{x} - #{distance}), ' ', (#{y}-#{distance}), ',', (#{x} + #{distance}), ' ', (#{y}-#{distance}), ',', (#{x} + #{distance}), ' ', (#{y}+#{distance}), ',', (#{x} - #{distance}), ' ', (#{y}+#{distance}), ',', (#{x} - #{distance}), ' ', (#{y}-#{distance}), '))' ))) AND SQRT(POW( ABS( X(location) - #{x}), 2) + POW( ABS(Y(location) - #{y}), 2 )) < #{distance} ORDER BY distance
